creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Mrs. Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: two images printed on one sheet; left image: view of concrete steps with a wall behind them, with graffitti letters including the word "SIN"; older man wearing dark pants and white short-sleeved shirt seated with knees drawn up at left; young woman wearing a dark skirt and flat shoes, lying down, at right; right image: two young dark-skinned women with bare feet, wearing slacks, seated on a concrete step in front of a wall with graffitti letters including "Aurther"; head and arm of dark-skinned man at left
signed: on back of mount, in red ink: [Eve Sonneman 1968]
title: Sin, San Francisco
